title: Lakshmi Polki Haaram with Ruby Accents
features: This exquisite Haaram features a geometric pattern of Polki diamonds set in a closed setting, surrounded by pave set diamonds. The design is further enhanced with round cut ruby pendants, adding a pop of color and traditional charm. It boasts a delicate filigree work. The necklace is finished with a secure hook closure.
description: A stunning statement piece combining the elegance of Polki diamonds with the vibrancy of rubies. The intricate craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish reflect the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry making. This Haaram is a timeless investment that can be passed down through generations, embodying tradition and luxury.
